Node.Text: Well hello, who do you think you are walking into my woods alone?

Node.OptionToEnter: I'm a clown in training looking to learn new jokes!
Node.Text: A clown in training, really, I know a lot about clowns and jokes.

Node.OptionToEnter: Who says these are your woods, why would you even be over here in the woods on your own anyway?
Node.Text: These woods are where I need to be, society shuns clowns like me.
Well speak up and say something or this'll be the last of you!
